Nostrich Team

Encourgaing business development under nostr

About Us

nostrich.team was created to encourage the professional development and expension of the nostr protocol

For 200,000 sats today, you can join us:

  • A customized for you nostr t-shirt
  • A valid NIP-05 nostrich.team domain name validation
  • Access to our private nostr relay
  • 10% of all profits go to development on the nostr protcol or applications on top of it

You can pay in sats with on-chain bitcoin, liquid, or lightning network to our CoinOS account.
